text:
by inserting a internal Link I get:
 
Error loading 
/lenya/mypub/authoring/index.html?lenya.usecase=kupu&lenya.step=link_librarie:404

Same on inserting an image:
  
Error loading 
/lenya/mypub/authoring/index.html?lenya.usecase=kupu&lenya.step=image_librarie:404
creator: jge@msc-ge.com
bobharner@gmail.com
text:
I tested this on a fresh install of 1.4 on Windows XP and cannot duplicate the
error.  I created a couple of pages, then used Kupu to create internal links in
each to the other, and I was able to find the documents to link to, create the
links, save the pages, and test the resulting links, without any problems.  If
anyone else is able to duplicate the problem, please do reopen this.
